title: Welcome
body:
Welcome to "Murderess She Wrote," the first of this two level game. Press the space bar to see what I have to say next...
What's your name?
Oh wait... I don't care. Down to Business.
I don't speak. I just talk by writing what I want to say in this floating bubble...
As the saying goes... Women should be seen and not heard...
You can use the spacebar to speed up dialogue. 
But I'll find you in the bathroom at midnight if you don't listen to me.
You should also use the up and down arrow keys and the enter/return button to make choices when you are asked to.
By the looks of ya, I'm guessing your choices will be the death of you. 
In this level, you will encounter dangerous women from lit and pop culture. 
Your goal is to survive each encounter. 
Rely on your own knowledge and mine to survive.
I'm your friend...or maybe not... 
I am a woman after all.
Either way...talk to me (or any other willing soul) for possibly helpful hints.
And just be aware you probably won't survive...
Extras make stupid decisions in the horror genre, and you are definitely an extra.
P.S. I won't be talking to you much after this... because the creators aren't making me.
I don't like to talk to people when I'm on my period... and I'm on it all the time.

title: Rose
body:
I can't leave... I CAN'T LEAVE!!!
[[ I'm Sorry | BMkill ]] [[ Sucks for you | BMkill ]]

title: Kill1
body:
I can help you...
[[ Let Bloody Mary help Rose | ohno33 ]] [[ Stop Bloody Mary from helping Rose | ouch ]]

title: No
body: No. You may not leave this enriching horror experience.

title: OMG
body: Oh my God! She bled on me!! My hairs gone flat and I'm having a heart attack!!!

title: Sorry
body: <<Complete>> Sorry, women aren't allowed in right now...

body: <<Complete2>> Sorry, women aren't allowed in right now...

title: Goahead
body: Forget the elevator... Go through the window that never lies...But beware of vanity and bad luck.
